bill.summary: 1/30/2007--Introduced. Recognizes Guardian Industries' commitment and leadership in the U.S. and global glass, automotive, and building products industries. Congratulates the company on its 75th anniversary as it continues to implement its philosophy of entrepreneurship and progressive management.
